variant.bodyText: On page 10 of Mark Johnson's "Computing with Features as Formulae" in Computa- tional Linguistics 20:1, the third sentence of the first paragraph should read "Blackburn et al. (1993) introduce a modal language LT for describing trees decorated with feature structures, whose satisfiability problem is decidable." We regret the error.

variant.note: Erratum page 10 of Mark Johnson's "Computing with Features as Formulae" in Computa- Linguistics the third sentence of the first paragraph should read "Blackburn et al. (1993) introduce a modal language LT for describing trees decorated with feature structures, whose satisfiability problem is decidable." We regret the error. 330
